reviewText: Have you ever seen an opponent press Duke for an entire game? There is a reason why. Between the concepts demonstrated in this DVD and the skills the Duke point guards have, most coaches think twice before pressing or tapping Duke for prolonged periods of time. Coach K demonstrates and explains his drills and concepts he teaches to beat a 2-1-2 half court trap, 1-3-1 half court trap, 2-2-1 3/4 court zone press and the 1-2-1-1 full court zone press. One of the tactics shown is how to score easy, quick goals against these defenses, one way to get a team to stop pressing! Kevin Sivils - author of Game Strategies and Tactics for Basketball Game Strategies and Tactics for Basketball: Bench Coaching for Success
